children.author: NotACanadian
children.comment: When the soil looks dry it's typically too late. Spray bottles are nice but it's really good to really impregnate the soil (if you mind the
I use a spray bottle every day to mist them, i heard they like that. Watered once a week when the soil looked dry.
Finland? How warm were they? Could you tell if it was moist/too moist?
I live in Finland and we just ended our winter season. I've been growing them next to the fridge with a grow lamp. but only 3 of 20 made it
Once or twice a week? Are you mad? Actually -check- the soil yourself and use your judgement to see if you need to water it or not.
